DOC.brief_summary: This study investigates the effect of a inhaled corticosteroid (fluticasone or "Flovent") on airway narrowing induced by hypertonic saline (salty water). The study hypothesis is that fluticasone will be more effective in preventing saline-induced airway narrowing than methacholine-induced narrowing.
DOC.brief_title: Dose Response Effects of Inhaled Fluticasone on Airway Effects of Hypertonic-saline in Asthma
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of asthma Habitual cigarette smoking
